EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-09-28-London Lunch with Node4.EMAIL-Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: London Lunch with Node4 - September 28, 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you for registering to attend the London Lunch with Node4 on September 28, 2017 at 12:00 p.m.! We look forward to discussing how Turbonomic is innovating to deliver unparalleled performance, efficiency and compliance to the cloud and data center ecosystems over lunch and drinks. Thursday, September 28, 2017, 12:00 p.m. The Royal Exchange - Sauterelle, Cornhill Room Royal Exchange, Threadneedle St, London EC3V 3LR
Please reach out to zoe.nageotte@turbonomic.com or your account executives for any further questions.
Best,
Turbonomic Team
